gate.jape.plus

Class SPTBase.FSMInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.jape.plus.SPTBase.FSMInstance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<SPTBase.FSMInstance>
    Enclosing class:
    SPTBase

    protected class SPTBase.FSMInstance
extends Object
implements Comparable<SPTBase.FSMInstance>
    An instance of the state machine.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int annotationIndex
      The current annotation this instance will be applied on
      protected Map<String,cern.colt.list.IntArrayList> bindings
      Store the currently bound annotations.
      int rule
      If the instance is in a final state (only applicable for FSMInstances stored inside the SPTBase.acceptingInstances list) this value stores the rule to be applied.
      int state
      The current state for this instance.

    • Field Detail

      • annotationIndex

        public int annotationIndex
        The current annotation this instance will be applied on

      • state

        public int state
        The current state for this instance.

      • rule

        public int rule
        If the instance is in a final state (only applicable for FSMInstances stored inside the SPTBase.acceptingInstances list) this value stores the rule to be applied.

      • bindings

        protected Map<String,cern.colt.list.IntArrayList> bindings
        Store the currently bound annotations. Keys are binding labels, values are lists of int values (representing annotation indexes).

    • Constructor Detail

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(SPTBase.FSMInstance other)
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface Comparable<SPTBase.FSMInstance>

      • clone

        public SPTBase.FSMInstance clone()
        Overrides:
        clone in class Object

      • pushNewEmptyBindingSet

        public void pushNewEmptyBindingSet()
        Pushes a new empty annotation set in the binding stack. This method is invoked for each opening-round-bracket transition that is consumed during the traversal.

      • popBindingSet

        public void popBindingSet(String label)
        Pops annotation set from the binding stack and puts it in the hash map bindings. This method is invoked when a closing-round-bracket transition '):label' is consumed during the traversal.

      • bindAnnotations

        public void bindAnnotations(int[] aStep)
        Adds all input annotations to every annotation set stored in the binding stack.
